Package org.gioac96.veronica.routing.pipeline.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ValidationFailureReason
    Reasons for validation failure.
    ValidationRule
    Field validation rule.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FieldValidator
    Field validator.
    FieldValidator.FieldValidatorBuilder<C extends FieldValidator,​B extends FieldValidator.FieldValidatorBuilder<C,​B>>  
    QueryValidator<Q extends Request>
    PreFilter that validates a Request query.
    ValidationFailureData
    Validation failure data, consisting of the name of the field that has an invalid value, and the reason of the failure.
    ValidationFailureResponse
    Response generated on validation failure.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommonValidationFailureReason
    Common reasons for validation failure.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ValidationException
    Exception thrown by validation filters on request validation failure.
